OrgName: CLARCOR Inc. and its subsidiaries located in the U.S.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
industrysector: Construction Equipment - (CON)Aircraft & Parts - (AIR)Automotive Parts & Service Equipment - (APS)
personaldata: Organization information, customers (including distributors), agents, re-sellers, partners, vendors, suppliers and employment candidates - data does include manually processed data
recoursemech:
As part of CLARCOR's participation in the Safe Harbor, CLARCOR has specifically engaged TRUSTe to assist in the resolution of unresolved concerns/complaints. TRUSTe is a third party provider of various privacy-related solutions and services. Any individual who does not believe that his or her concern has been adequately resolved by CLARCOR's internal process may initiate TRUSTe’s complaint resolution services.  

For human resources data CLARCOR has agreed to cooperate with European Data Protection Authorities.  

By voluntarily certifying that it will comply with the Safe Harbor Principles, CLARCOR has made itself subject to the dispute resolution, enforcement and sanctioning powers of the Federal Trade Commission and has agreed to cooperate and comply with the applicable Data Protection Authorities with regard to CLARCOR's processing of personal information.
